siteMetadata.title: vwa.la help

ghostPost.title: How do I change my ghost.io subdomain?
ghostPost.excerpt: Learn how to change your ghost.io subdomain using Ghost admin.
ghostPost.meta_title: How do I change my ghost.io subdomain? - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: Learn how to change your ghost.io subdomain using Ghost admin, or how to set up a branded custom domain instead!

primary_tag.name: Ghost(Pro)
primary_tag.description: Commonly asked questions and support for Ghost(Pro) customers!
primary_tag.meta_description: Commonly asked questions and support for Ghost(Pro) premium hosted customers!

tags.name: Ghost(Pro)
tags.description: Commonly asked questions and support for Ghost(Pro) customers!
tags.meta_description: Commonly asked questions and support for Ghost(Pro) premium hosted customers!

ghostPost.plaintext:
To change your publication subdomain, e.g. yoursite.ghost.io, go to my.ghost.org
[https://my.ghost.org/]  and click the“Change” button next to"Your Ghost.io
URL.” 

Once a new subdomain has been set, your publication will no longer be available
at the old URL.If you would like to use a branded custom domain instead of a ghost.io 
subdomain, refer to the custom domain guides
[https://docs.ghost.org/faq/using-custom-domains/].
ghostPost.html:
To change your publication subdomain, e.g. yoursite.ghost.io, go to my.ghost.org and click the“Change” button next to"Your Ghost.io URL.”

Once a new subdomain has been set, your publication will no longer be available at the old URL.

If you would like to use a branded custom domain instead of a ghost.io subdomain, refer to the custom domain guides.
